Kjorikos unleashes another arcane greatsword, this time extending it into a combination that cleaves the tree Tatsumaki's just leapt from into three parts. He keeps up the swing, floating around his golem to extend it in a wide arc through the trees; Kainzo's Bastion emerges, large, luminescent, but most importantly, in the way, blocking the strike and shattering itself as the blade comes undone.

“Now!” He shouts, and you see his cloak fluttering as he leaps from the brush nearby. The golem moves to intercept, and he parries the massive fist with his greatsword, guiding it to the ground in search of space to engage the Artificer.

There's shouting, as Vyx joins him, cartwheeling into the open and landing on one knee, a surprising number of her blood-red caster bolts managing to find their target. Nel and Andor arrive next, light attackers that he seems more cautious to approach directly, likely due to the surprise bomb earlier.
